channel.title: TGaceAllStories
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from TGaceAllStories, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: ‘It’s an expensive piece of equipment’: My neighbor asked to borrow my snowblower. Do I say yes?
item.description: “The projected snowfall this weekend doesn’t look to be changing too much.”

item.title: Natural-gas futures are surging again, after last week’s historic climb
item.description: Natural-gas prices were off to another blistering start on Monday as a bitter winter storm has left thousands without power.

item.title: Why many large-bank stocks look like bargains for long-term investors
item.description: A combination of high and improving returns on equity and low or declining price/earnings ratios make the case for several major industry players.

item.title: ‘I‘m facing an ethical dilemma’: My widowed mother is cutting my step siblings out of the family trust. Do I have a responsibility?
item.description: “My mother has now hired an attorney to revise the trust and remove her late husband’s children as beneficiaries.”

item.title: ‘I need protein shakes’: Couples disagree about panic-buying for this weekend’s snowstorm
item.description: There’s one thing worse than hunkering down during a snowstorm — and that’s doing so with someone who resents your spending.

item.title: Dutch Bros’ brand strength sets stage for growth in the coffee chain, says Citi
item.description: Citi's $82 price target implies that shares of Dutch Bros could rally 34% from here.

item.title: Meta poised for nearly 40% upside on compelling AI and ad opportunities, analyst says
item.description: After stalling over the past 12 months, Rothschild & Co Redburn believes that shares of Meta could rally 37% from here.

item.title: Mike Santoli: Can an old bull learn new tricks?
item.description: Now in its fourth year, the bull market is maturing and finding it harder to rely on the energy sources of its youth.

item.title: Morgan Stanley’s top picks into earnings include AMD and Costco
item.description: Advanced Micro Devices and Costco will report earnings next Tuesday and Wednesday, respectively.

item.title: Silver is having a parabolic move. How to hedge against a decline using options
item.description: Michael Khouw breaks down how to hedge risk in silver using options.

item.title: Biotech Stocks Skyrocket on Game-Changing News
item.description: Discover why biotech stocks like CRVS and RAPT are surging today on trial breakthroughs and deals. Learn trading insights and risks in this exciting m...

item.title: SelectQuote Surges 23% on $415M Credit Facility News
item.description: SelectQuote (SLQT) stock jumped 23% on January 12, 2026 after securing a $415M credit facility. Dive into the details, risks, benefits, and how simila...

item.title: Monte Rosa Therapeutics (GLUE) Soars on Promising Inflammation Drug Data
item.description: Monte Rosa Therapeutics (GLUE) stock surges over 42% on positive Phase 1 data for MRT-8102, showing profound reductions in inflammation marker hsCRP. ...

item.title: FIGR Stock Jumps Big on Blockchain Lending Wave
item.description: Discover why Figure Technology Solutions (FIGR) surged 21.67% today amid blockchain advancements like $YLDS and RWA Consortium. Learn trading lessons,...

item.title: Holy Ship! HII Stock Jumps on Trump Navy Ship Plans
item.description: HII stock rises on Trump's Golden Fleet plans for new powerful warships. Explore how navy announcements impact markets, with balanced views on potenti...
